vulnerabilities: Information Exposure Through an Error Message
Use of GET Request Method With Sensitive Query Strings
description: The function is vulnerable to information exposure through error messages (CWE-209) as it sends detailed error messages to the client. This could potentially reveal sensitive information to an attacker. It also uses GET request method with sensitive query strings (CWE-598), which can expose sensitive information as URLs are logged in various places such as browser history, web server logs, and network appliances. Additionally, the function is vulnerable to information exposure (CWE-200) as it reveals system-level details through the use of error messages and log files.
